projects.title: TC Staining
projects.problem: TC Staining needed a professional online presence to showcase their staining services and attract new customers.
projects.solution: Built a modern, responsive website with clean design, service showcases, and easy contact methods to help grow their business.
projects.outcome: Professional digital presence that effectively communicates services and makes it easy for customers to get in touch.

projects.title: Higgs Hauling
projects.problem: A veteran-owned dumpster rental company needed a comprehensive website to showcase services, pricing, and service areas to compete in the Lawton, Oklahoma market.
projects.solution: Developed a complete website featuring service listings, transparent pricing, customer reviews, service area information, and an easy-to-use quote request form.
projects.outcome: Professional website that highlights their veteran-owned status, clearly presents dumpster rental options, and streamlines customer inquiries.
